FuncDef: The display fwm dldp statistics command displays statistics about the DLDP module on a specified board. The display fwm dldp statistics command displays statistics about the DLDP module on a specified board.
CLIs: display fwm dldp statistics [ all ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates all statistics (including the statistics whose value is 0).
-

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display fwm dldp statistics all slot 1
